column5: So i went out for a quick fish this evening up at Lake Scugog. Fishing the shore and using my fishing snakes i had 2 real good hits and on 1 i broke off. However the only fish i brought in was this little bass. Yes my smallest of 2008.....
Wel, I've thought about it, and, I'm pretty sure it's still better than a kick in the pants!    Good on ya for going out there and getting at least one!
hey, that's better than sitting at home. Enjoy the summer while you can man, it's always too short.
Stop pouting..you caught a fish....LOL.  Shore fishing is tough at times, but you did your time and was rewarded with one.
right on teamate...beats being skunked brother.  While you were reeling that little bad boy in, I was tiling my kitchen walls...    you wanna talk about being stressed out.  Cheers, UF
I'd take that 1 bass over my day of work! lol
1 Fish .. better than no fish.  No fish .. better than 1 day at work.
yeah way better then sitting at home or working, keep it up the big ones dont bite all the time  cheers!
